column4: Where can I find the "add/remove" list in Ubuntu - for programs not in Synaptic?
if you run aptitude, it'll give you a list of manually installed and obselete debs
Yes I know how Synaptic works, I am talking about Debs I manually installed that were not in synaptic, bbrazil - Thnks, i'll give it a shot
also, you only need to keep track of the package name, maybe also the version
